import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'./Loginsignup.css';import user_icon from'../Assets/person.png';import email_icon from'../Assets/email.png';import password_icon from'../Assets/password.png';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Loginsignup=()=>{const[action,setaction]=useState("Login");const[name,setName]=useState("");const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const[password,setPassword]=useState("");const navigate=useNavigate();const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(action==="Login"){if(!email||!password){alert("Please enter both email and password to login.");return;}alert("\u2705 Logged in successfully!");navigate("/movies");// Go to movie page
}else{if(!name||!email||!password){alert("Please fill all fields to sign up.");return;}alert("\u2705 Signed up successfully!\nWelcome, ".concat(name,"!"));}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text",children:action}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"underline"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,className:"inputs",children:[action==="Sign Up"&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"input",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:user_icon,alt:"User"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Name",value:name,onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"input",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:email_icon,alt:"Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",placeholder:"Email Id",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"input",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:password_icon,alt:"Password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value)})]}),action==="Login"&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"forgot_password",children:["Lost Password?"," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{onClick:()=>navigate("/forgot-password"),style:{cursor:"pointer",color:"blue"},children:"Click Here!"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"submit_container",children:[action!=="Sign Up"&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"submit",onClick:()=>setaction("Sign Up"),children:"Sign Up"}),action!=="Login"&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"submit",onClick:()=>setaction("Login"),children:"Login"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"submit_button",children:"Submit"})]})]});};export default Loginsignup;
